########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND drm_sources
    drm_util.cc 
    drm_transm_params.cc 
    drm_params.cc 
    drm_config.cc
    drm_tables_mapping.cc 
    drm_tables_params.cc
    scrambler_bb_impl.cc
    audio_encoder_sb_impl.cc
    generate_fac_b_impl.cc
    generate_sdc_b_impl.cc
    add_tailbits_bb_impl.cc
    punct_bb_impl.cc
    interleaver_bb_impl.cc
    interleaver_cc_impl.cc
    partitioning_bb_impl.cc
    cell_mapping_cc_impl.cc
    qam_map_bc_impl.cc
    m3ufile_source_f_impl.cc
    wavfile_drm.cc
)

set(drm_sources "${drm_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT drm_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT drm_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-drm SHARED ${drm_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-drm gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime ${Faac_LIBRARIES})
target_include_directories(gnuradio-drm
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
    ${Faac_INCLUDE_DIR}
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-drm PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_drm_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-drm PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-drm)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_drm_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-drm)

if(NOT test_drm_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_drm_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_drm_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("drm_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
